HINTS.ENTER_VALUES: Values can be set by clicking on a cell and typing on the keyboard.
HINTS.SELECT_OR_SIZE: Select an existing Sudoku to be solved or select a size. Afterwards the values of the cells can be set.

ERROR.NOT_A_SQUARE: The height of the Sudoku has to equal its width.
ERROR.INVALID_NUMBERS: All numbers have to be ≥ 1 and ≤ {{limit}}.

UNSUPPORTED.NOT_QUADRATIC: Sudokus of this size are not supported.

MAX.TOOLTIP: Maximum steps which the solver executes before it terminates. This prevents an infinite-loop, if no solution is found.

STEP.CLEANUP_POSSIBLE_VALUES: Remove found values from possible values
STEP.EMPTY_CELLS_TO_POSSIBLE_VALUES: Determine possible values in empty cells
STEP.SINGLE_POSSIBLE_VALUE: Convert cells where only one value is possible
STEP.VALUES_POSSIBLE_ONCE: Search for values which are possible only once
STEP.ELIMINATE_POSSIBLE_PAIR: Eliminate pairs, which are possible only twice, from other cells

PAUSE_AT_STEP.LABEL: Pause at step
PAUSE_AT_STEP.TOOLTIP: Pauses the solver when the specified step is reached.

DELAY.TOOLTIP: Waiting time in milliseconds between steps while solving the Sudoku
